clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use in the treatment of schizophrenia and depression

contraindications.disease: LD sub 50 sub 300 mk kg Oral in mice LD sub 50 sub 791 mg kg Oral in rats LD sub 50 sub 87 mk kg IV in mice LD sub 50 sub 37 mg kg IV in rats
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Flupenthixol is an anxiolytic antidepressive agent and a mood stabilizer It inhibits the central monoamine receptors particularly the dopamine D1 and D2 receptors Therefore it increases the amount of serotonin and noradrenaline that control mood and thinking and improves mood
